abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; lavish, European-style furniture made by Pottier & Stymus that decorated Flagler estate in Palm Beach, Fla, in early 20th century has been restored and will go on display at Flagler Museum there.
lead_paragraph: The museum, once the home of an oil and rail magnate and his much younger wife, is relining its music room with these luxurious pieces.

headline.main: Flagler Museum’s Gilded Seating, Restored, Evokes a Sumptuous (and Torrid) Gilded Age
headline.print_headline: Flagler Museum’s Gilded Seating, Restored, Evokes a Sumptuous (and Torrid) Gilded Age

snippet: The museum, once the home of an oil and rail magnate and his much younger wife, is relining its music room with these luxurious pieces.
